name: Cusco, Sacred Valley, Aguas Calientes Y Machu Picchu
description: Apparently built by the Inca Pachacutiq, Machu Picchu was declared a World Heritage Site and one of the seven wonders, by the breathtaking beauty that is based on its rugged geography. Amazed and entranced visitors visiting scientists every year, Machu Picchu with its squares and precincts, the hosts and admiring incomparable.
